function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Housing insecurity leading to mental health issues such as chronic mental disorders, depression, psychological distress, anxiety, and suicide.","Impact":"Decreased mental well-being and increased risk of mental health issues within the population.","Mitigation":"Developing housing policies that prioritize housing stability and ownership, providing support for individuals affected by housing insecurity, and implementing mental health interventions.","Technologies":"Community planning tools for affordable housing, mental health support services, and online resources for housing assistance.","People":"Residents affected by housing insecurity and mental health issues.","Owner":"Local governments, housing associations, mental health organizations."}]}
